species.name: swablu
descriptions: A Pokémon that has wings like cottony clouds. After enduring winter, in which little food is available, SWABLU flocks move closer to towns in the spring.
For some reason, it likes to land on people’s heads softly and act like it’s a hat.
It can’t relax if it or its surroundings are not clean. It wipes off dirt with its wings.
It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
Its cottony wings are full of air, making them light and fluffy to the touch. Swablu takes diligent care of its wings.

abilities.name: natural-cure
abilities.effect: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

abilities.name: cloud-nine
abilities.effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.
